source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: UVW Unwrapping in 3ds Max Mastered - From Beginner to Pro
items.headline: Learn the hidden yet simple tricks the pros use & master UVW Unwrapping. UVW Unwrapping made simple for all your assets!
objectives_summary: Learn the most important, core UI elements of the UVW Editor in 3ds Max
Become a pro at UVW unwrapping your game assets in 3ds Max
Learn to UVW Unwrap all sorts of 3d shapes - from simple to complex - hard surface to organic

items.title: All about Eevee for Blender 2.8 and above
items.headline: How to master the render engine Eevee in all situations.
objectives_summary: Blender Eevee in depth. First through small sessions showing how to set it all up and then by making an advanced Western scene.

items.title: CAD for Kids - Intro to 3D Design & 3D Printing
items.headline: STEM for Homeschoolers
objectives_summary: 3D Design and 3D Printing for Kids
16 weeks of CAD lessons and exercises
This is an entry-level course ideal for elementary and middle school age students

items.title: VRay Exterior Workshop
items.headline: Master your Exterior Renders
objectives_summary: You'll be able to setup an exterior scene with HDRI lighting
Re-Use my extrerior preset with rendering and lighting settings
Work with the most  efficient 3 level method

items.title: Introduction To V-Ray in 3ds Max : Official V-Ray Mentor

visible_instructors.name: Jake
visible_instructors.display_name: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.title: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor

items.headline: Learn the essentials of V-Ray from an Official V-Ray Mentor | V-Ray for 3ds Max
objectives_summary: Learn from an Official V-Ray Mentor
Understand the basic foundations needed to use V-Ray in 3ds Max
Build upon the skills learned to create photorealistic images

items.title: Autodesk Revit 2021 Complete Beginners Guide
items.headline: Learn to use the Revit BIM Software
objectives_summary: Autodesk Revit Software
Building Design
Creating 3D Floor Plans

items.title: 3D Printing Quickstart with SketchUp Make
items.headline: Learn tips and tricks in SketchUp Make to get you up and running in the world of 3D printing!
objectives_summary: Create a custom work of art that you can hold in your hand! I will give you information on where to have your parts printed, and can even print and send your part to you myself at a discounted price.
Apply the tools and features in SketchUp Make to the creation of 3D CAD models.
Create 3D models in an efficient way that will be suitable for printing on a 3D printer.

items.title: Learn SOLIDWORKS Basics by practicing 45 exercises
items.headline: Master SOLIDWORKS Basics & Move to an Advanced Level by Practicing 45 Exercises.
objectives_summary: Understand 3D Modeling Concept  in softwares like SolidWorks.
Gain sketching and modeling skills by practicing more than 40 exercises.
Model faster and more efficient.

items.title: Photorealistic Car Rendering with 3Ds Max and VRay
items.headline: Photorealistic Car Rendering with 3Ds Max and VRay
objectives_summary: Able to set up a studio for car rendering
Create materials for different part of your car.
Able to set up different lights for rendering car.

items.title: Rigging and Animating Vectors in Moho Pro
items.headline: Animate vector based characters using Moho's robust bone and action tools.
objectives_summary: Properly rig a vector based character with bones
Correct vector movements with Smart Bones
Create face controls for blinking, eye movements and emotions

items.title: Create a professional logo motion using Motion v.2 Script
items.headline: Motion v2 | Masterclass of Motion Graphics| Beginner to Advanced| After Effects 2019
objectives_summary: How to use all of Motion v2 Script
Create advanced Type Animation in 2D by this sctript
Create a professional logo motion using Motion v.2 script

items.title: 3D Modelling with 3ds Max : The Quickest Way

visible_instructors.name: Jake
visible_instructors.title: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor
visible_instructors.display_name: Jake Denham BA, MA, Official V-Ray Mentor

items.headline: 3D Modelling in 3ds Max: Create 3D assets using 3Ds Max
objectives_summary: How to model assets with 3ds Max
The tools and techniques to use
Master poly modelling

items.title: 3ds max and V-ray training for interior designers
items.headline: This course will teach you to do photorealistic renders. I will show all my sectets.
objectives_summary: Make any interior renders
Make photorealistic renders
Become professional 3d visualizer

items.title: 3ds Max + Forest Pack: Create Realistic 3d Environments

visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop
visible_instructors.name: Adam
visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger

items.headline: Create photorealistic 3d environments quickly in 3ds Max by using professional tools like Forest Pack and Quixel Suite
objectives_summary: Create a photorealistic 3d environment quickly with professional tools
Master the use of environment building tools like Forest Pack and Quixel Megascans
Use V-Ray to add to your environment with atmosphere, displacement and other essential settings

items.title: VRay NEXT for 3Ds Max - Complete Video Guide
items.headline: All VRay Next functions and features in one class
objectives_summary: Will know how to use VRay NEXT
Have deep understanding of PRO VRay Workflow
Will explore all functions and features of VRay NEXT

items.title: All about 3D printing
items.headline: learn about world fastest growing technology
objectives_summary: 3D Printing
3D modeling
Addative manufacturing
